document_data.name: Aladiam
document_data.mainbody:
'''Aladiam''' was the proprietor of [[Aladiam's Imports]], an imports shop found in [[Tegal's Mark]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]]. In addition to providing [[Sembia]]n [[spices]] and silks from his store, he moonlighted as a smuggler and a fence, selling and transporting stolen goods.

From his shop, he would often recruit adventurers and sell-swords to transport stolen goods for him.
document_data.Possessions: Among his belongings, Aladiam possessed a ''[[scimitar of speed]]''.
